senselogic.sitevision.api.format

Interface NumericFormatterBuilder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Builder<NumericFormatter>

    public interface NumericFormatterBuilder
extends Builder<NumericFormatter>
    Builder for creating NumericFormatter instances.

    Tip! The Builder interface documentation contains more information about Builders and how to work with them!

    An instance of the Sitevision class implementing this interface can be obtained via FormatterBuilderFactory.

    Since:
    Sitevision 6.1
    Author:
    Magnus LÃ¶vgren

      Creates a NumericFormatter instance using currently specified state/behaviour.

    • Method Detail

      • setUseGrouping

        NumericFormatterBuilder setUseGrouping(boolean aUseGrouping)
        Set whether or not grouping will be used in this formatter.

        This method is conceptually equivalent with java.text.NumberFormat.setGroupingUsed(boolean).

        Parameters:
        aUseGrouping - true to use grouping, false otherwise
        Returns:
        this builder

      • setMinIntegerDigits

        NumericFormatterBuilder setMinIntegerDigits(int aMinIntegerDigits)
        Sets the minimum number of digits allowed in the integer portion of a number.

        This method is conceptually equivalent with java.text.NumberFormat.setMinimumIntegerDigits(int).

        Parameters:
        aMinIntegerDigits - the minimum number of integer digits to be shown
        Returns:
        this builder

      • setMaxIntegerDigits

        NumericFormatterBuilder setMaxIntegerDigits(int aMaxIntegerDigits)
        Sets the maximum number of digits allowed in the integer portion of a number.

        This method is conceptually equivalent with java.text.NumberFormat.setMaximumIntegerDigits(int).

        Parameters:
        aMaxIntegerDigits - the maximum number of integer digits to be shown
        Returns:
        this builder
